name: komga
description: Komga is a self hosted comics and manga server. It organizes libraries, tracks reading progress, supports multiple users and provides a responsive reader interface, similar to what Jellyfin or Plex offer for video.
features: Comics & Manga Server: Self-hosted digital library for comics, manga, and graphic novels. Your personal comic server.
Format Support: Read CBZ, CBR, PDF, EPUB, and other comic formats. Support for all common file types.
Web Reader: Built-in responsive reader with page-by-page and continuous scroll modes. Read on any device.
Reading Progress: Automatic progress tracking with resume from last page. Never lose your place.
Library Scanning: Automatic library scanning with series and collection detection. Organize comics effortlessly.
Metadata Management: Fetch and edit metadata, covers, and series information. Maintain accurate library details.
Multi-User: Individual user accounts with separate reading progress and preferences. Share library with family.
OPDS Support: Access library through OPDS-compatible comic readers. Use your preferred reading app.
Collections: Organize comics into custom collections and reading lists. Curate your reading experience.
Search & Filter: Advanced search with filters for publishers, genres, and reading status. Find comics quickly.
API Access: RESTful API for integrations and custom applications. Extend functionality as needed.
Duplicate Detection: Identify and manage duplicate files in library. Keep library clean and organized.
